subject: Re: You Tube Video and Audio
author: rosemary_guiley
full_text:
Thanks, Kristin.  Even though I have only recently posted some clips,
I have been using my Frank's Boxes and the Mini quite a bit.  Got the
FBs last June and the Mini in Dec.  I'm often at the mercy of book
deadlines & travel, so I have to just lurk a lot on the forum.  The
"conditioning" certainly improves with usage, and I seem to be getting
progressively better results.

Rosemary
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
>
> REG - I watched the YouTube and I heard the clips without watching.  You
> have very strong communication with the Mini.  
> 
> k
> 
>  
> 
>   _____  
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On
Behalf Of
> rosemary_guiley
> Sent: Monday, June 30, 2008 6:03 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] You Tube Video and Audio
> 
>  
> 
> Hi Folks,
> 
> Recently I did an investigation at the Lincoln Theater in Decatur, IL
> with my Mini-Box, and got some interesting clips from the basement
> area. The files are too large to be uploaded to the forum here, but a
> short video with the audio clips has been posted on You Tube by Joey
> Tito, a Chicago researcher who filmed the investigation. The audio
> clips are at the end, and Joey matched them to a transcript of what I
> picked up. I sent the clips to Frank, and he picked up even more.
> 
> The You Tube link is www.youtube.com/xflexx1 Joey has a short version
> and a long version; pick the short one.
> 
> I have a report on the investigation posted on my blog on MySpace at
> www.myspace.com/rosemaryellenguiley and Joey's video is on my home
> page there as well. The blog also has my report on a similar
> investigation at Ohio State Reformatory in Mansfield; the clips from
> that are posted on this forum in my folder.
> 
> Regards,
> Rosemary
>
